name: Keep Your Distance
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Hold Left Shift + WASD - Roll

Space Bar - Cast spell(Mouse will highlight target, some spells cast on self).

Numbers 1 through 0 - Select spells(Not available in Random mode.

F1, F2, F3, F4 - spawn enemies. Best used in sandbox.

Escape - Takes you back to the main menu.

Big shout out to Ors373 for the help on the project.

Another shoutout to GameDevHQ.com. My game development journey with Unity all started because of them.

And GamesPlusJames for hosting this gamejam, giving me an opportunity to program a game again, something I haven't done in a very long time.
